INST: In this test, you will be asked to move the mouse as quickly as possible from its initial location to the red target.  The target will be at a different location each time, and will be of different sizes.  Try to move quickly to the target without overshooting.
INSTNOPREVIEW: You will not see the target before you start moving, so be careful not to overshoot the target.
INSTTYPE2: When you move to the target, click the mouse.
INSTTYPE3: When you move to the target, stop moving to indicate you have reached the target.
